meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Throw</kanji> your <kanji>draft</kanji> at people to <vocabulary>post</vocabulary> it on their Facebook wall! Wait, that's not how it works? Hush, yes it does, just throw it harder.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
